comment.author: 39551838@N08
comment._content: Looks like King George VI and Queen Elizabeth on their 1939 tour...you have a photo here: www.gov.ns.ca/nsarm/virtual/halifax/archives.asp?ID=79 that has them in the same clothes and say's they're in Pictou near a railway station...

comment.author: 61232251@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/jeffbishop] They had a whirlwind tour of the province right before the outbreak of WWII... I like the "onlookers" in this photo. One appears to have a small camera.
